price: Moses said, “Do not take me to task for what I forgot, and do not make it too difficult for me to follow you.”
arabic: قَالَ لَا تُؤَاخِذۡنِي بِمَا نَسِيتُ وَلَا تُرۡهِقۡنِي مِنۡ أَمۡرِي عُسۡرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
